comments:
To reproduce:

1. Type @Table(name="") into a valid Entity without a defined table
2. Backspace over the last "

An NPE occurs that leaves the tools in an unusable state.  The Workbench must be restarted.


java.lang.NullPointerException
	at org.eclipse.jpt.ui.internal.mappings.details.TableCombo.getConnectionProfile(TableCombo.java:232)
	at org.eclipse.jpt.ui.internal.mappings.details.TableCombo.removeConnectionListener(TableCombo.java:323)
	at org.eclipse.jpt.ui.internal.mappings.details.TableCombo.disengageListeners(TableCombo.java:305)
	at org.eclipse.jpt.ui.internal.details.BaseJpaController.populate(BaseJpaController.java:68)
	at org.eclipse.jpt.ui.internal.mappings.details.TableComposite.doPopulate(TableComposite.java:84)
	at org.eclipse.jpt.ui.internal.details.BaseJpaController.populate(BaseJpaController.java:69)
	at org.eclipse.jpt.ui.internal.mappings.details.EntityComposite.doPopulate(EntityComposite.java:137)
	at org.eclipse.jpt.ui.internal.details.BaseJpaController.populate(BaseJpaController.java:69)
	at org.eclipse.jpt.ui.internal.details.PersistentTypeDetailsPage.populateMappingPage(PersistentTypeDetailsPage.java:228)
	at org.eclipse.jpt.ui.internal.details.PersistentTypeDetailsPage.populateMappingComboAndPage(PersistentTypeDetailsPage.java:216)
	at org.eclipse.jpt.ui.internal.details.PersistentTypeDetailsPage.doPopulate(PersistentTypeDetailsPage.java:179)
	at org.eclipse.jpt.ui.internal.details.BaseJpaDetailsPage.doPopulate(BaseJpaDetailsPage.java:52)
	at org.eclipse.jpt.ui.internal.details.BaseJpaController.populate(BaseJpaController.java:69)
	at org.eclipse.jpt.ui.internal.details.BaseJpaDetailsPage.populate(BaseJpaDetailsPage.java:47)
	at org.eclipse.jpt.ui.internal.views.JpaDetailsView.setCurrentPage(JpaDetailsView.java:135)
	at org.eclipse.jpt.ui.internal.views.JpaDetailsView.select(JpaDetailsView.java:60)
Also hit this exception when changing a configured Entity to an Embeddable.

It's a little easier to get this than previously expected.  All you have to do is type @Table(name= and pause and this error will be hit.  This is a very likely case for a user just typing in annotations on their own.
Fixed for inclusion in the 5/12 i build
